title-group.article-title: Integration Processes of Ordinary Differential Equations Based on Laguerre-Radau Interpolations

abstract.p: In this paper, we propose two integration processes for ordinary differential equations based on modified Laguerre-Radau interpolations, which are very efficient for long-time numerical simulations of dynamical systems. The global convergence of proposed algorithms are proved. Numerical results demonstrate the spectral accuracy of these new approaches and coincide well with theoretical analysis.
